channel.title: Adding custom items to PI client invent and ground item problem

item.title: Adding custom items to PI client invent and ground item problem
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

if(i == 11796){ itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Weild"; itemDef.name = "Keris"; itemDef.description = "An ancient dagger".getBytes(); itemDef.anInt174 = 641;//Inv & Ground itemDef.modelZoom = 580; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 196; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 864; itemDef.anInt204 = 84; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -4; itemDef.anInt165 = 640;//Male Wield View itemDef.anInt200 = 640;//Female Wield View itemDef.anInt188 = -1; itemDef.anInt164 = -1; itemDef.anInt175 = -1; itemDef.anInt197 = -1;

its this that isnt identifyed in my client, wonder what it needs to be when i use a converter.

Read full topic
